name: Yokoton Sling
description:
Defend your dice tower from marauding Yokoton spirits!

Choose which dice to equip, then roll them bones to see what effects you can sling at those nasty spirits. Hold out as long as you can!

CONTROLS

Click and drag  the slingshot to aim and fire your die
SHIFT to toggle enemy health bars
SPACE to re-roll dice

ATTRIBUTIONS Game Music

Seashore by Adriel Fair
